Author: NewBullMoose
Text: I'm not sure what other things you may have going on, but I know in my case when I felt very similar to you it was extremely helpful to go on antidepressants. I was very resistant at first (practically to the point of aggression which is very uncharacteristic of me, but hey that's what this thing does to me), but over time it has made all the difference. Mind you it wasn't even the first one that I went on that did the most good, but once I found the right one I pretty much felt reborn. Everybody is different, and this may not apply to you in the slightest, but please take this into consideration if it does fit your situation. Best of luck and hope you feel better.
